snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Tuesday's selection includes Uber ending its taxi service in New York and new information on a damaging type of cyberattack.
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Tuesday's selection includes Uber ending its taxi service in New York and new information on a damaging type of cyberattack.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Steve Jobs's Spirit, and Cyberattacks
